meanings.sent1: I woke up earlier than usual today.
meanings.sent2: She finished her homework earlier than him.
meanings.sent3: The cat ate its dinner earlier than the dog!
meanings.sent4: The sun sets earlier in winter.
meanings.sent5: The early bird catches the worm, so wake up earlier!

meanings.sent1: He had visited that place earlier.
meanings.sent2: She regretted not studying earlier for the exam.
meanings.sent3: The old man spoke of his adventures earlier in life.
meanings.sent4: The memories of earlier times flooded back to her.
meanings.sent5: Earlier, people used to communicate through letters.

meanings.sent1: The earlier train is always less crowded.
meanings.sent2: She preferred the earlier flight for her convenience.
meanings.sent3: The earlier chapters of the book were more exciting.
meanings.sent4: The earlier stages of the project were challenging.
meanings.sent5: The earlier deadline motivated them to work faster.
